rule: The output should be in plain text format without any special formatting, markup, or additional characters.
input: Advancements in battery technology may extend electric vehicle range
validityText:
The input is "Advancements in battery technology may extend electric vehicle range". According to the input specification, the text must be in the English language, which this input is. It is also in plain text format, satisfying that requirement. Since it is a piece of text that resembles a headline or the leading sentence of an article, it fits the specification stating that input can be any text such as a news article or headline. There is no specified length limitation, so this input complies in terms of text length. All criteria outlined in the input specification are met.

OK
